title: Amid threat of U.S. attack, Iran nuclear talks proceed without breakthrough
summary_full: The meeting Tuesday occurred against the backdrop of an expanded U.S. military presence in the Middle East, as President Donald Trump threatens to attack Iran if a deal cannot be reached.
summary_public: The meeting Tuesday occurred against the backdrop of an expanded U.S. military presence in the Middle East, as President Donald Trump threatens to attack Iran if a deal cannot be reached.

IR.label: neutral
IR.evidence: Iran nuclear talks proceed without breakthrough
